content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
So ono!!!The food was great; they definitely deserve their #1 rating!  The owner was very nice, too.  He explained the menu, made some recommendations, and gave us a complimentary dessert because it was my son's birthday.Don't miss your chance to eat at Broken Mouth!
